directions: Combine the tomatoes, peaches, apples, onions, celery, vinegar, salt and pickling spice in a large stockpot. Bring to a boil, then reduce heat to low, and simmer for about 2 hours, or until thickened. Transfer to sterile jars and store in the refrigerator, or freeze in plastic containers.
ingredients: 5 fresh peaches - peeled, pitted and chopped
5 red apples - peeled, cored and diced
1 cup pickling spice, wrapped in cheesecloth
title: Lucy's Tomato and Peach Chutney
